summary: This bill, the Albatross and Petrel Conservation Act of 2025, aims to implement the Agreement on the Conservation of Albatrosses and Petrels. It outlines measures for species reestablishment, nonnative species management, habitat conservation, human activity management, and education. It also addresses prohibited acts, permits, penalties, international cooperation, and bycatch mitigation related to the conservation of these seabirds. The bill designates responsibilities for the Secretary of the Interior and the Secretary of Commerce, along with other agencies.
